alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 7:11PM EST until January 02 at 2:45PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rough River near Dundee affecting Ohio County. .Today`s rainfall will cause the river to continue to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rough River near Dundee. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, County roads between Dundee and Narrows flood. At 26.0 feet, County roads near Sunnydale flood. At 27.0 feet, KY 919 flood at Underwood and Clifty Huff Roads near Narrows. At 28.0 feet, Trailers courts in Hartford flood. At 29.0 feet, KY 136 at Heflin Road floods near county line. KY 69 floods near intersection of US 231 in Hartford. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 23.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 27.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.1 feet on 06/29/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued when updated forecasts become available.
